mapper.insert: insert into wallet_account( uid, account_type, total_balance, frozen_balance, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{uid}, #{account_type}, 0.0, 0.0, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE wallet_account set total_balance=#{balance}, update_time=now() WHERE uid=#{uid} AND account_type=#{account_type}
UPDATE wallet_account set total_balance=total_balance+#{balance}, update_time=now() WHERE uid=#{uid} AND account_type=#{account_type}
mapper.select: SELECT total_balance FROM wallet_account WHERE uid=#{uid} AND account_type=#{account_type}
